name: Devlings: Minigames with virtual friends
description:
The Devlings are here and they want to play with you! 🙂

Have fun with your cute little pet friends in 8 different minigames designed to pass the time.

Make them dodge obstacles with precise timing or shoot them across space!

How far can you go? Put your skills to the test! 🔥

❖ Dodge squares and pick up Circles in a race through the sky!

❖ Jump down the hill while avoiding trees and holes!

❖ Try to fall on top of the clouds and slide down to victory!

❖ Try to shoot Devlings into space, but be careful with the moving walls!

❖ Tap with precise timing to Zig Zag across the ground or fall to your doom!

❖ Move from left to right as an endless rain of blocks tries to take you off the platform!

❖ Soar through the night with your finger while hordes of falling walls attempt to stop you!

❖ Rescue your friends from space while avoiding meteorites!

Want to take a break? chill out in the home screen with your cute friends. Turn your phone sideways and they will fall! Bring more little pets to the party by tapping on the screen.

Can you find all of them? 😝
